game.name: Witch Stone
game.shortDescription: Witch Stone - arcade game from the subgenre 3 in a row, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Witch Stone - arcade game from the subgenre 3 in a row, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.

reviewHighlights.text: Lucky me gets to write the first review for Witch Stone, which is a 2D mobile app tier clicker/physics puzzle from known asset flippers, Piece of Voxe...
A game in the "three in a row" genre, which has its own characteristics: you need to destroy certain blocks in order to collect chains. With each leve...
